item.title: I Believe in Bitcoin
item.description: A remark about the future of bitcoin The Context I believe in Bitcoin because not much else in our age is worth believing in. We have reaffirmed the wisdom of the ancients as creatures unable to be trusted with ourselves. It was our generation’s mass realization and exposure of this truth that spurred Bitcoin’s conception in 2008 and birth in 2009. Bitcoin is that rare and prudent human invention that endeavors to safeguard against us.
